Our members will be trained comprehensively by taking training not only every week but also during the National Day and winter holidays, participating in competitions with other universities, and being tutored by our coaches directly.Our debate team won thirdThe Debate & Eloquence AssociationDebate  Eloquence AssociationThe tradition of debate, which traces its history back to 1993, has deep roots in Nankai University. With the contemporary society competition intensified, an outstanding eloquence, as well as a speculative spirit, becomes a common pursuit of talents in this new era. The Association of Debate  Eloquence has accompanied the growth and development of debate in Nankai since its foundation in 1996. From the large-scale debate events of all kinds in the 1990s to these yeaNankai University Model United Nations Association (NKUMUNA)Focusing on Model United Nations and related activities, NKUMUNA has developed for more than ten years since being established. After several years’ efforts, the association has become increasingly strong and mature gradually.Since 2011, NKUMUNA and TUMUNA have taken turns to host Nankai University-Tianjin University National Model United Nations Conference annually, attracting over 300 students from various schools and universities to participate in every year, which has been highly influentialThe Student Career Development AssociationThe full name of us is the Student Career Development Association. As one of the oldest and biggest student associations aimed at preparing the student for future work, now we are embarking on a professional and student-oriented approach, uniting the efforts of our university and some companies to benefit students even more.We are now:Offering our members special training on many basic skills, such as PS, PPT, dressing code, activity management and so onCooperating with some companies to hold leNankai Advisory ClubNankai Advisory Club (NAC) is a group of Nankai students and alumni who are passionate about consulting. As a platform for connection, NAC is committed to delivering consulting insights as well as providing networking and job searching resources for Nankai students who are interested in careers in the consulting field. The goal of NAC is to promote Nankai students to make a positive impact on the consulting field in China.38 Tongyan Road, Jinnan District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300350 94 Weijin Road, Nankai District, Tianjin, P.R.China 300071Copyright: Nankai University All Rights ReservedContact usAbout NKUWho We AreHistoryLeadershipAdministrationFacts&FiguresAdmissionDegree EducationNon-Degree EducationEnglish-taught ProgramsExchange ProgramsSummer ProgramsContinuing EducationAcademicsUndergraduate programsGraduate programsColleges and SchoolsResearch InstituesScholarshipResearchLeading ResearchFacultyPublicationsReasearch UnitsGlobalGlobal StrategyPartnersGlobal ResearchSino-foreign Cooperation EducationStudent Exchange ProgramsConfucius InstituesInternational OrgnizationsCampus LifeThings to doVisit NKUResources and ServicesX  Student CommunitiesStudent CommunitiesLibraryMapsContactLanguageMENUAbout NKUWho We AreHistoryLeadershipAdministrationFacts&FiguresAdmissionDegree EducationNon-Degree EducationEnglish-taught ProgramsExchange ProgramsSummer ProgramsContinuing EducationAcademicsUndergraduate programsGraduate programsColleges and SchoolsResearch InstituesScholarshipResearchLeading ResearchFacultyPublicationsReasearch UnitsGlobalGlobal StrategyPartnersGlobal ResearchSino-foreign Cooperation Educa...Student Exchange ProgramsConfucius InstituesInternational OrgnizationsCampus LifeThings to doVisit NKUResources and ServicesCampus Lifehomepage  Campus Life  Things to do  Student CommunitiesThings to doVisit NKUResources and ServicesStudent CommunitiesThe 21st Century Youth Association of Nankai University21st Century Youth Association of Nankai University, consisting of a Chinese debate team and an English speaking team, is an excellent association in Tianjin, winning the title of top ten clubs of Nankai University for 14 consecutive years. of Nankai University, consisting of a Chinese debate team and an English speaking team, is an excellent association in Tianjin, winning the title of top ten clubs of Nankai University for 14 consecutive years. Our members will be trained comprehensively by taking training not only every week but also during the National Day and winter holidays, participating in competitions with other universities, and being tutored by our coaches directly.Our debate team won thirdThe Debate & Eloquence AssociationDebate  Eloquence AssociationThe tradition of debate, which traces its history back to 1993, has deep roots in Nankai University. With the contemporary society competition intensified, an outstanding eloquence, as well as a speculative spirit, becomes a common pursuit of talents in this new era. The Association of Debate  Eloquence has accompanied the growth and development of debate in Nankai since its foundation in 1996. From the large-scale debate events of all kinds in the 1990s to these yeaNankai University Model United Nations Association (NKUMUNA)Focusing on Model United Nations and related activities, NKUMUNA has developed for more than ten years since being established. After several years’ efforts, the association has become increasingly strong and mature gradually.Since 2011, NKUMUNA and TUMUNA have taken turns to host Nankai University-Tianjin University National Model United Nations Conference annually, attracting over 300 students from various schools and universities to participate in every year, which has been highly influentialThe Student Career Development AssociationThe full name of us is the Student Career Development Association. As one of the oldest and biggest student associations aimed at preparing the student for future work, now we are embarking on a professional and student-oriented approach, uniting the efforts of our university and some companies to benefit students even more.We are now:Offering our members special training on many basic skills, such as PS, PPT, dressing code, activity management and so onCooperating with some companies to hold leNankai Advisory ClubNankai Advisory Club (NAC) is a group of Nankai students and alumni who are passionate about consulting. As a platform for connection, NAC is committed to delivering consulting insights as well as providing networking and job searching resources for Nankai students who are interested in careers in the consulting field. The goal of NAC is to promote Nankai students to make a positive impact on the consulting field in China.Student CommunitiesThe 21st Century Youth Association of Nankai University21st Century Youth Association of Nankai University, consisting of a Chinese debate team and an English speaking team, is an excellent association in Tianjin, winning the title of top ten clubs of Nankai University for 14 consecutive years. As a platform for connection, NAC is committed to delivering consulting insights as well as providing networking and job searching resources for Nankai students who are interested in careers in the consulting field. As a platform for connection, NAC is committed to delivering consulting insights as well as providing networking and job searching resources for Nankai students who are interested in careers in the consulting field.
